Class Jtest3

java.lang.Object
Jtesting.Jtest3
public class Jtest3 extends Object
A test class for validating the operations of the Review System and its database interactions.

This class contains unit tests that verify the proper functionality of operations for managing reviews, reviewer requests, and user interactions. The tests cover the following key operations:

  • Review creation and management
  • Reviewer request processing
  • Student-Reviewer interactions
  • Trusted reviewer functionality
  • Review weight management

Each test method follows a consistent pattern:

  1. Setting up test data
  2. Executing the operations being tested
  3. Verifying the expected outcomes

All tests utilize a database connection that is refreshed before each test execution to ensure test isolation.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp() throws SQLException
      Sets up the test environment before each test.

      This method initializes the database helper, establishes a database connection, and creates test data including users, questions, and answers.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper2.connectToDatabase()

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown() throws SQLException
      Cleans up resources after each test.

      This method removes test data and closes the database connection to ensure proper resource management and test isolation.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper2.closeConnection()

    • createTestReview

      private int createTestReview() throws SQLException
      Helper method to create a test review and return its ID
      Throws:
      SQLException
